solution_line_template: If Monroe and her husband ate {eaten_by_adults} granola bars, then the number of granola bars the children shared is {total_granola_bars}-{eaten_by_adults} = {granola_bars_for_children}

Each child received {bars_per_child} bars, and there were {granola_bars_for_children} granola bars, meaning there were {granola_bars_for_children}/{bars_per_child} = <<{granola_bars_for_children}/{bars_per_child}={number_of_children}>>{number_of_children} children in the family.
